td.span: Mostly sunny, with a high near 64. Northeast wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 44. Northeast wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

A 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly between 8am and 11am. Increasing clouds, with a high near 70. East wind 6 to 16 mph becoming west in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 24 mph.
